questions.question_text: je je mārā kahevāyā chho temā māre ek _____ _____ rahevā devī nathī.
questions.explanation: As per Vach.Ga.Ma.45, 'je je mārā kahevāyā chho temā māre ek talmātra kasar rahevā devī nathī.'

questions.question_text: Sukh dukh äve sarve bheļu, temā rākhajyo sthir mati; Jāļavīsh mārā janne, vaļī karīsh jatan ati.
Māțe tame pan sūdhā sāvadhān rahejyo; jo jarāy _____ rākhasho to tamāro pag takashe nahī.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.Ma.45, one should remain vigilant to avoid faltering.

questions.question_text: Nahi to tame nachint rahejyo, karavu tamāre kāī nathī; Je malyā chhe tamane, te pār chhe Aksharthī.
Ane māre to je tame Bhagwānnā bhakta chho tenā hrudaymā koī jātnī _____ tathā koī jātno _____ swabhāv te rahevā devo nathī.
questions.explanation: Vach.Ga.Ma.45 states that the Lord does not allow any desires or bad habits to remain in the hearts of His devotees.

questions.question_text: Te Bhagwānno jene pratyaksh pramān dradh āsharo hoy tene manmā evī bīk na rākhavī je, 'Hu rakhe marine bhūt-pret thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!'
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 7

questions.question_text: Em karatā jo pand padashe, to āgaļ sukh chhe ati ghaņu; Pan vrat tek jo _____ to, bhogavasho sahu sahu taņu.
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Bhaktachintamani

questions.question_text: Je malyā chhe tamane, te pār chhe Aksharthī.
Je evo Bhagwānno bhakta hoy te to Bhagwānnā dhāmne ja pāme pan vachmā kyāy tene Bhagwān _____ de nahī.
questions.explanation: According to Vach.Ga.An.7, a devotee of God attains God's abode and is not left in between.

questions.question_text: Sukh dukh äve sarve bheļu, temā rākhajyo sthir mati
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Bhaktachintamani
